title: Search

xdm:searchEngine.title: Search Engine
xdm:searchEngine.description: The search engine used by the search.

xdm:searchEngineID.title: Search Engine ID
xdm:searchEngineID.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the search engine used by the search.

xdm:isPaid.title: Is Paid
xdm:isPaid.description: Indicate if the search is paid or not.

xdm:pageDepth.title: Page Depth
xdm:pageDepth.description: The page depth in the search results.
